# SILA - Premium Hair Salon Budapest

> SILA is a premium hair salon located in the heart of Budapest, on Erzsébet Square. We offer personalized hair services in an intimate apartment-studio setting.

## About Us

SILA is not just a hair salon - it's a sanctuary where the rushing world stops. Located on the first floor of a beautiful turn-of-the-century building at Erzsébet tér 2, our studio offers a unique view of the iconic Ferris wheel.

## Services

We specialize in:
- Balayage and hair coloring
- Haircuts and styling
- Hair treatments
- Bridal and special occasion styling
